list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move rhythmically to music, typically following a set sequence of steps.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their cheeks were pressed together as they danced
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Má của họ đã được ép vào nhau khi họ nhảy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) move in a quick and lively way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sheila nhảy múa trong vui vẻ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a series of movements that match the speed and rhythm of a piece of music.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: everyone was taking part in the dance
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mọi người đang tham gia điệu nhảy
